result.title: Mac and Sublime Text with 2GB stack
result.content: Those who use Mac and want to use sublime text editor as their default editor for C++ coding the G++11 build file will helpful for them. Just copy the file into the regarding directory or you can create a new Build system and copy paste my configuration. This allows C++11 and you are allowed to take 2GB stack size. :) Link of the file is given below. https://github.com/ddxofy/SublimeTextSnippets
